com.unitedcaterers.client

Class ClientModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.unitedcaterers.client.ClientModel

  • public class ClientModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This is the main model for the view. It also contains submodels for the components inside the main view. Data contained by this model is displayed by the view.

      • setDisplayRows

        public void setDisplayRows(java.lang.String[][] newRows)
        Sets the rows to be displayed. Used by the controller.
        Parameters:
        newRows - data for newRows

      • setMessageModel

        public void setMessageModel(MessageModel newModel)
        Sets the MessageModel. Used by the controller. Should not be called more than once because views would be viewing this Model and replacing the model itself will make the views view a stale model. In general, models are created only once. The data that they contain keeps changing.
        Parameters:
        newModel - newModel
